sentences.en: ‘They offered me £10,000.’ ‘I’ll give you double.’
sentences.cn: “他们向我开价1万英镑。” “我给你加倍。”

sentences.en: a double sink
sentences.cn: 双水槽

sentences.en: a double wardrobe
sentences.cn: 双门衣柜

sentences.en: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room.
sentences.cn: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

sentences.en: Don't try and double-cross me, Taylor, because I'll kill you.
sentences.cn: 别跟我耍花招，泰勒，要不我会杀了你。

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: Don’t park your car on double yellow lines.
sentences.cn: 不可以在双黄线处停车。

sentences.en: he disappeared at the double.
sentences.cn: 他很快就消失了。

sentences.en: I did a double-take when I saw her dressed in biker's gear.
sentences.cn: 看见她一身赛车手打扮，我一时没反应过来。

sentences.en: Our yacht was well equipped with two double cabins fore and aft.
sentences.cn: 我们的游艇设施完备，首尾有两个双人舱。

sentences.en: Scotch and water, please – make it a double.
sentences.cn: 请来苏格兰威士忌加水——要双份的。

sentences.en: She threatened to publicly expose his double life if he left her.
sentences.cn: 她威胁说如果他离开她，她就将他双重人格的生活方式公之于众。

sentences.en: Strain the mixture through a double thickness of muslin or cheesecloth.
sentences.cn: 用双层平纹细布或干酪包布过滤混合料。

sentences.en: The car pulled in and double-parked in front of the town hall.
sentences.cn: 车在市政大厅前靠边并排停下了。

sentences.en: The church has doubled its membership in the last five years.
sentences.cn: 这座教堂的会众在过去的五年里增加了一倍。

sentences.en: The city was enclosed by walls of double thickness.
sentences.cn: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

sentences.en: The city was enclosed by walls of double thickness. ＃
sentences.cn: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

sentences.en: The company is now offering to double-glaze the windows for £3,900.
sentences.cn: 该公司现在报价3,900英镑安装双层玻璃窗。

sentences.en: the great double doors of the cathedral
sentences.cn: 大教堂宏伟的双开大门

sentences.en: The newspaper used the neologism "dinks", Double Income No Kids.
sentences.cn: 报纸使用了新词“丁克族”，即“双收入无子女”。

sentences.en: The number of managers must double to 100 within 3 years.
sentences.cn: 经理的人数在3年内必须翻倍达到100人。

sentences.en: The rod bent double, the reel shrieked and ratcheted.
sentences.cn: 操作杆进一步弯曲，线轴发出刺耳的吱吱声。

sentences.en: There wasn't room to stand up and he had to bend double.
sentences.cn: 空间太小无法站直，他不得不弓着身子。

sentences.en: They laugh so hard they double up with laughter.
sentences.cn: 他们捧腹大笑，直不起身来。

sentences.en: They left themselves wide open to accusations of double standards and hypocrisy.
sentences.cn: 他们使自己陷于被人指责搞双重标准和虚伪不实的境地。

words.tran_cn: 加倍；并线；折回；防护板；衬里
使加倍；使成双（double的ing形式）；绕过；握紧

phrases.tran_cn: 双效；双重效果；双重影响
以已输的数额作为最后赌注（或者多输一倍，或者与赢家清帐）
双边的；双面板；双面材质
双星（紧密相连的二颗星，借望远镜始可分辨者）
双声道，双声轨（录音磁带）

phrases.phrase: on the double 或 at the double

trans.tran_cn: 两倍的，成双的，双重的，连续两个的，供两人用的
trans.tran_en: consisting of two parts that are similar or exactly the same
to become twice as big or twice as much, or to make something twice as big or twice as much

trans.tran_cn: 两倍，酷似的人，双份的酒，双人房
trans.tran_en: something that is twice as big, as much etc as usual or as something else
something that is twice as big, as much etc as usual or as something else
to become twice as big or twice as much, or to make something twice as big or twice as much
